ygData.subject: Don't Give up hope!
ygData.msgSnippet: Operaman, I have and go through this EXACT same thing! To be honest? I have given up on trying to teach people until now The groups I am in at 26 are MUCH
ygData.messageBody:
Operaman,

I have and go through this EXACT same thing!

To be honest? I have given up on trying to teach people until now

The groups I am in at 26 are MUCH better at listening to new tactics
since as you get more levels, the 'run to mommy' spots greatly reduce
(guards, zone points, etc) in number, and staying alive
is a big priority.

So, don't give up hope, just wait a while =)

People come around, but not until its worth it to them.

Frashii, 26th Bell Bard
Seekers of Lore Officer, Tarew Marr http://www.loreseekers.com

>
From: "Operaman" <slider@...>
>
> I've almost given up on trying to perfect this (Lullaby) with
> pickup groups
> at my level (16-19). Either nobody understands /assist, they
> don't trust my
> lullaby to work, or they just plain don't listen. After one
> nightmarish pull
